verses.verse: Thou <WG4771> therefore <WG3767>, my <WG3450> son <WG5043>, be strong <WG1743> in <WG1722> the grace <WG5485> that is in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424>.

And <WG2532> the things <WG3739> that thou hast heard <WG191> of <WG3844> me <WG1700> among <WG1223> many <WG4183> witnesses <WG3144>, the same <WG5023> commit thou <WG3908> to faithful <WG4103> men <WG444>, who <WG3748> shall be <WG2071> able <WG2425> to teach <WG1321> others <WG2087> also <WG2532>.
Thou <WG4771> therefore <WG3767> endure hardness <WG2553>, as <WG5613> a good <WG2570> soldier <WG4757> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>.
No man <WG3762> that warreth <WG4754> entangleth himself <WG1707> with the affairs <WG4230> of this life <WG979>; that <WG2443> he may please <WG700> him who hath chosen him to be a soldier <WG4758>.
And <WG1161> if <WG1437> a man <WG5100> also <WG2532> strive <WG118> for masteries, yet is he <WG4737> not <WG3756> crowned <WG4737>, except <WG3362> he strive <WG118> lawfully <WG3545>.
The husbandman <WG1092> that laboureth <WG2872> must be <WG1163> first <WG4413> partaker <WG3335> of the fruits <WG2590>.
Consider <WG3539> what <WG3739> I say <WG3004>; and <WG1063> the Lord <WG2962> give <WG1325> thee <WG4671> understanding <WG4907> in <WG1722> all things <WG3956>.

Remember <WG3421> that Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> of <WG1537> the seed <WG4690> of David <WG1138> was raised <WG1453> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498> according to <WG2596> my <WG3450> gospel <WG2098>:

Wherein <WG1722> <WG3739> I suffer trouble <WG2553>, as <WG5613> an evil doer <WG2557>, even unto <WG3360> bonds <WG1199>; but <WG235> the word <WG3056> of God <WG2316> is <WG1210> not <WG3756> bound <WG1210>.

Therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> I endure <WG5278> all things <WG3956> for <WG1588> the elect's <WG1588> sakes <WG1223>, that <WG2443> they <WG846> may <WG5177> also <WG2532> obtain <WG5177> the salvation <WG4991> which <WG3588> is in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> with <WG3326> eternal <WG166> glory <WG1391>.
It is a faithful <WG4103> saying <WG3056>: For <WG1063> if <WG1487> we be dead with <WG4880> him, we shall <WG4800> also <WG2532> live with <WG4800> him:
If <WG1487> we suffer <WG5278>, we shall <WG4821> also <WG2532> reign with <WG4821> him: if <WG1487> we deny <WG720> him, he also <WG2548> will deny <WG720> us <WG2248>:
If <WG1487> we believe not <WG569>, yet he <WG1565> abideth <WG3306> faithful <WG4103>: he cannot <WG3756> <WG1410> deny <WG720> himself <WG1438>.

Of these things <WG5023> put them in remembrance <WG5279>, charging <WG1263> them before <WG1799> the Lord <WG2962> that they strive <WG3054> not <WG3361> about words <WG3054> to <WG1519> no <WG3762> profit <WG5539>, but to <WG1909> the subverting <WG2692> of the hearers <WG191>.

Study <WG4704> to shew <WG3936> thyself <WG4572> approved <WG1384> unto God <WG2316>, a workman <WG2040> that needeth not to be ashamed <WG422>, rightly dividing <WG3718> the word <WG3056> of truth <WG225>.
But <WG1161> shun <WG4026> profane <WG952> and vain babblings <WG2757>: for <WG1063> they will increase <WG4298> unto <WG1909> more <WG4119> ungodliness <WG763>.
And <WG2532> their <WG846> word <WG3056> will eat <WG2192> <WG3542> as <WG5613> doth a canker <WG1044>: of whom <WG3739> is <WG2076> Hymenaeus <WG5211> and <WG2532> Philetus <WG5372>;

Who <WG3748> concerning <WG4012> the truth <WG225> have erred <WG795>, saying <WG3004> that the resurrection <WG386> is past <WG1096> already <WG2235>; and <WG2532> overthrow <WG396> the faith <WG4102> of some <WG5100>.

Nevertheless <WG3305> the foundation <WG2310> of God <WG2316> standeth <WG2476> sure <WG4731>, having <WG2192> this <WG5026> seal <WG4973>, The Lord <WG2962> knoweth <WG1097> them that are <WG5607> his <WG846>. And <WG2532>, Let <WG868> every one <WG3956> that nameth <WG3687> the name <WG3686> of Christ <WG5547> depart <WG868> from <WG575> iniquity <WG93>.

But <WG1161> in <WG1722> a great <WG3173> house <WG3614> there are <WG2076> not <WG3756> only <WG3440> vessels <WG4632> of gold <WG5552> and <WG2532> of silver <WG693>, but <WG235> also <WG2532> of wood <WG3585> and <WG2532> of earth <WG3749>; and <WG2532> some <WG3739> <WG3303> to <WG1519> honour <WG5092>, and <WG1161> some <WG3739> to <WG1519> dishonour <WG819>.

If <WG1437> a man <WG5100> therefore <WG3767> purge <WG1571> himself <WG1438> from <WG575> these <WG5130>, he shall be <WG2071> a vessel <WG4632> unto <WG1519> honour <WG5092>, sanctified <WG37>, and <WG2532> meet <WG2173> for the master's use <WG1203>, and prepared <WG2090> unto <WG1519> every <WG3956> good <WG18> work <WG2041>.

Flee <WG5343> also <WG1161> youthful <WG3512> lusts <WG1939>: but <WG1161> follow <WG1377> righteousness <WG1343>, faith <WG4102>, charity <WG26>, peace <WG1515>, with <WG3326> them that call on <WG1941> the Lord <WG2962> out of <WG1537> a pure <WG2513> heart <WG2588>.
But <WG1161> foolish <WG3474> and <WG2532> unlearned <WG521> questions <WG2214> avoid <WG3868>, knowing <WG1492> that <WG3754> they do gender <WG1080> strifes <WG3163>.

And <WG1161> the servant <WG1401> of the Lord <WG2962> must <WG1163> not <WG3756> strive <WG3164>; but <WG235> be <WG1511> gentle <WG2261> unto <WG4314> all <WG3956> men, apt to teach <WG1317>, patient <WG420>,

In <WG1722> meekness <WG4236> instructing <WG3811> those that oppose themselves <WG475>; if <WG3379> God <WG2316> peradventure <WG3379> will give <WG1325> them <WG846> repentance <WG3341> to <WG1519> the acknowledging <WG1922> of the truth <WG225>;

And <WG2532> that they may recover themselves <WG366> out of <WG1537> the snare <WG3803> of the devil <WG1228>, who are taken captive <WG2221> by <WG5259> him <WG846> at <WG1519> his <WG1565> will <WG2307>.
